short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embeds StreetCheck easily into propertypal. Home icons created by Vectors Market - Flaticon https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/home

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When opening a property on propertypal.com, just by simply having this plugin installed, it will do the following: 
It will provide a clickable link to streetcheck.co.uk for the postcode of the property which will give you all the information about the surrounding arean such as People, Culture, Employment etc.
